trans-unit.source: Provides functionality to change a WS-Discovery protocol version to another type.
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.Configuration.DiscoveryVersionConverter"></xref> class.

Returns a value that indicates whether it is possible to change the given <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"></xref> object to the type of this converter and using the specified context and culture information.
Type descriptor format information that assists in the conversion of a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"></xref> object to another type.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"></xref> object that is changed to the type of this converter.
`true` if it is possible to change the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"></xref> object to the type of this converter; otherwise, `false`.

Returns a value that indicates whether it is possible to change the given <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"></xref> to the specified type and using the specified context and culture information.
Type descriptor format information that assists in the conversion of a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"></xref> object to another type.
The type to which the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"></xref> object is changed.
`true` if it is possible to change the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"></xref> object to the specified type; otherwise, `false`.
Converts the given <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"></xref> object to the type of this converter, using the specified context and culture information.
Type descriptor format information that assists in the conversion of a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"></xref> object to another type.
The culture information to use in the type conversion.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"></xref> object to change.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"></xref> that has been changed to the type of this converter.
Converts the given <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"></xref> to the specified type, using the specified context and culture information.
Type descriptor format information that assists in the conversion of a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"></xref> object to another type.
The culture information to use in the type conversion.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"></xref> to change.
The type to which the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"></xref> object is being changed.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"></xref> that has been changed to the specified type.
